Namespace Microsoft.SqlTools.ServiceLayer.Credentials.Contracts

Classes

Credential

A Credential containing information needed to log into a resource. This is primarily defined as a unique CredentialId with an associated Password that's linked to it.

DeleteCredentialRequest

Delete Credential request mapping entry

ReadCredentialRequest

Read Credential request mapping entry. Expects a Credential with CredentialId, and responds with the Password filled in if found

SaveCredentialRequest

Save Credential request mapping entry
